import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiPower, FiTrash2 } from 'react-icons/fi' import LogoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg'; import './styles.css'; import api from '../../services/api'; export default function Profile() { const [incidents, setIncidents] = useState([]); const ongName = localStorage.getItem('ongName'); useEffect(() => { api.get('profile', { headers: { Authorization: ongId, } }).then(response => { // usado para pegar os dados setIncidents(response.data); }) }, [ongId]); return (
Bem vinda, {ongName}; Cadastrar novo caso
